fields.description:
h5.Description:
1.Select run configuration from run menu
2.Apply LiveView
3.Run application

h5.Actual Result:
1.We get File Server unavailable. Host Unreachable' error in the device.

h5.Expected Results:
1.We should not get any errors & liveview should run fine.
fields.summary: Liveview : On genymotion android throws 'File Server unavailable. Host Unreachable' error
